item.description:
Roses Berry Farm in Glastonbury is well known for their "Breakfast with a View," a simple and inexpensive breakfast on the deck overlooking the farm.  Breakfast menu includes pancakes, waffles, or French toast, topped with seasonal fruit.  We'll meet of breakfast at 11:00, just look for the tall people in the line!

After fortifying ourselves with a good breakfast, we'll head down to the trees to pick some apples.

Roses also has great farm store and a variety of activities for the young and young-at-heart.

Since breakfast is only served on Sunday, if the weather is particularly icky, we'll postpone a week!
item.name: Breakfast with a view and apple picking
